name: Psychological Reversal Techniques
description: Using the psychological tactics of PSNs against them to neutralize their influence.

cards.title: Reversing Gaslighting
cards.description: Using their own tactics of reality distortion against them to expose their contradictions.
bulletpoints: Repeating their words back to them in a more extreme form forces them to self-contradict.
Feigning confusion and making them over-explain their lies disrupts their psychological control.
Demanding evidence for every claim they make forces them into a logical dead-end.

cards.title: Echo Chamber Subversion
cards.description: Seeding dissonant thoughts into their own manipulative frameworks to destabilize their control.
bulletpoints: Introducing harmless yet conflicting ideas into their echo chambers forces internal chaos.
Using subtle suggestions rather than direct confrontation prevents immediate detection.
Encouraging self-reflection in a way that makes them doubt their own tactics weakens their influence.

cards.title: The Self-Projection Trap
cards.description: Forcing PSNs to fall into their own psychological traps by leveraging their own tendencies.
bulletpoints: Encouraging their overconfidence leads to self-sabotaging mistakes.
Acting as if you believe their lies can cause them to overcommit and expose themselves.
Appearing to agree while subtly steering them toward irrational conclusions accelerates their downfall.
